Name: Mirror Maiden
Title: "Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Envoy
Desc: All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightness...
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Fatui Mirror Maiden

C122021.Name: Refraction
C122021.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this card is attached switches to another character:</color> Elemental Dice Cost +1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>\n(Only one such status can be applied on the same side at a time)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
